title: Weather API Project
short_description: Connecting to a weather API with the users geolocation and getting the weather and area for them..
description: Connecting to a weather API with the users geolocation and getting the weather and area for them with the latitude and longitude adding it on to the end of the API. This is built using HTML, SCSS and Jquery, using Ajax to connect to the API.
skills: HTML, CSS (Scss), Jquery, Ajax Mobile Responsive, Git, Gulp

skills: HTML, CSS (Scss), Javascript and, Mobile Responsive

title: Travel App
short_description: Travel App built in Javascript to keep track of your trips...
description: Travel App built in Javascript to keep track of your trips, it uses local storage to store your trips you have already added.

title: Canvas Drawing Board
